entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as collapsing, coughing, and shuddering. She is also shown to be caring for Harry and Ron by handing them a bottle of dittany and providing them with pumpkin juice and clean robes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being able to cast protective spells, but also having angry red burns on his face and arms. He is shown to be in pain while applying dittany to his injuries.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as having angry red burns on his face and arms, but is also shown to be watching the skin on his hands regrow after applying dittany.

entities.name: shell cottage
entities.description: Shell Cottage is mentioned as the source of pumpkin juice that Hermione brought for Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: Hermione handed Harry a bottle of dittany, showing that she is helping him with his injuries.
Hermione also provided Ron with pumpkin juice and clean robes, indicating that she is helping him as well.
Harry and his friends escaped from the vault, implying that they visited Shell Cottage before returning to their current location.
